U

undo() - Method in class paint.CCanvas
This Method is responsible for undoing actions that are taken by the user, by pop-ing them off of the undo stack, and setting the canvas to be the next image in line, so to speak.
undo() - Method in class paint.CustomTab
Undo the last edit on the imgcanvas.
update() - Static method in class paint.Paint
This method is intended to be a general purpose update script, currently it only handles showing and hiding the edit tool bar, but it could be expanded to do anything else that warrants updating the window.
updateDimensions() - Method in class paint.CCanvas
This method runs only when the Images are opened, or when the canvas is resized, and sets the canvas width to be the proper size.
updateDimensions(Image) - Method in class paint.CCanvas
Update the canvas dimensions to be that of an image.
updateDimensions(boolean) - Method in class paint.CCanvas
